siteMetadata.title: James Marshall
siteMetadata.description: The personal blog of James Marshall, scrum master, developer, technophile and father.

node.excerpt: Let's play a game. I'll start a well-known saying, and you finish it for me. When life gives you lemons... Every cloud has... The early bird... Bet you got all three, didn't you? These platitudes are so commonplace that's they're sometimes easy toâ€¦
